Blueprints:

FirstPersonCharacter - We used the default FirstPersonCharacter as a base to create our code.

SK_Mannequin/ThirdPerson_AnimBP/All Anims(8)/SK_Mannequin_PhysicsAsset/UE4_Mannequin_Skeleton - We used the default mannequin and animations of the ThirdPerson Project.

FirstPersonGameMode - We used as a base to create our code. 

Sounds:

All Effects Sounds are from Soundly. Just two musics aren't but we listed in final of the game.
